channel.title: FAM Thread 2 (Day 2)
channel.description:
# [color=ffc60a]Welcome to FoL's Annual Mash![/color] Hosted by @Chloe, @DatBird, @Geyde, @Arete, and @osieorb18 Host account: @FoLAnnualMash Big thanks to Marl and Firekitten for their moral support.
## [color=ffe296]Rules[/color] Follow the [Global Forum Rules](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244) as well as the [Forum Game Rules](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/official-forum-game-rules/78926) Flavorclaiming is not allowed. More information can be found farther down. ## [color=ffe296]What is FAM?[/color] All roles are custom-made, and will be designed based on the players who join the game. You may even get lucky and roll yourself! Everybody will have one or more ability/passive; *nobody will be vanilla.* This game will feature In-Thread-Attacks (ITAs). Along with this, there will be events in which you can earn prizes (or death)! There will be at least two factions - Town and Mafia. Third-party roles (neutrals) may exist. ## [color=ffe296]Voting[/color] * Both majority and plurality are in effect. * All votes must be in the form of `**/vote [player]**` to be considered valid, and all unvotes must be in the form `**/unvote**`. After voting in the main thread, send a link to the post in which you voted in the voting thread, or will not be counted. * You may self-vote. Along with this, no-elimination is a valid vote, and may be hammered to end the day early. In cases where no-elim and another vote are tied at the end of the day, no-elim will have priority in the rand. * Tied votes will result in a player being eliminated at random from among the tied players. * MyLo (mis-eliminate and lose) and LyLo (eliminate or lose) will not be announced, and votes will not be locked. ## [color=ffe296]Gameplay[/color] * Days are 36 hours and nights are 12 hours. In the instance the day ends early due to majority, the Night phase will be extended to begin at a consistent time. * Deadline to submit Night actions is 2 hours before Night ends. * Deadline to submit Day actions is 1 hour before Day ends, unless specified otherwise. * Barring the potential existence of janitors, flips will always be true. Rolecards will not be fake. Conversion does not exist. Game-ending jesters do not exist. * Other than the above, everything is on the table (: * We will be following [Natural Action Resolution](https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Natural_Action_Resolution). If there are any major issues with NAR, [Reasonable Action Resolution](https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Reasonable_Action_Resolution) may be utilized. (We don't expect this to occur) * Should the main thread reach 9k posts, a new thread will be created. ## [color=ffe296]ITAs[/color] * Every day starting Day 2, there will be a single ITA window that begins 6 hours after SoD, and ends 6 hours before EoD. During this period, you may submit an ITA by typing some variety of `**/ITA [player]**` and pinging the host account: @FoLAnnualMash * ITAs have a base accuracy of 10% * Do not attempt to ITA if you are out of shots. If you shoot a dead player, your shot will be refunded * If a player is protected from an ITA, the feedback will be 'Hit! Nobody died.' Otherwise the feedback will be a death, or 'Miss!' * ITAs will be disabled after a certain point. This will be whenever the hosts deem fit. ## [color=ffe296]Rolecards and Flavor[/color] ### Example Rolecard >
> > > **Chloe** > *'its not fucking o???'* > [color=green]**Town Idiot**[/color] >
> > **Expert of Forum Mofoa:** All instances of the letter *i* that you post in the thread must be replaced with the letter *o*. To bypass this restriction, you may post freely as long as you include an image of a cat within your post. > > *Eliminate the Mafia and all other possible threats to the Town.* The user is **Chloe**, the role name is [color=green]**Town Idiot**[/color], and the flavor is *'it's not fucking o???'* as well as 'Expert of Forum Mofoa.'
# [color=darkred]**DO NOT FLAVORCLAIM OR PARAPHRASE FLAVOR. YOU MAY ONLY CLAIM YOUR USER AND ROLE**[/color]
**Do not claim or paraphrase any quotes or flavor within your rolecard. Do not claim the name of your abilities or passives. You may paraphrase what your passives or abilities *do*, but may not repeat the text word-for-word.** The alignment of any User will be entirely random. Attempting to solve the game based on flavor is useless. ### Standard Win Conditions [color=green]**Town**[/color] is the uninformed majority. Their win condition is: *Eliminate the Mafia and all other possible threats to the Town.* [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] is the informed minority. Their win condition is: *You win the game if no more threats to the Mafia exist or nothing can prevent that from happening.* Other win conditions may or may not exist. --- # Players 1. @Blizer 4. @Mistyx 5. @Aelin 9. @Marluxion 10. @Solic 13. @PokemonKidRyan 16. @Vulgard 17. @SirDerpsAlot -> @EliThePsycho 18. @Lemonfairy 19. @TrustworthyLiberal 21. @Centuries 23. @WindwardAway 24. @Italy 25. @clonedcheese 26. @Arctic 30. @Jane 31. @Gghana 32. @katze 33. @Emilia 34. @Luxy 35. @Appelsiini 37. @Ami -> @Esooa 39. @Frostwolf103 41. @an_gorta_pratai 43. @Universal 45. @nutella 46. @orangeandblack5 # Dead Players 1. @eevee - Modkilled Day 1 - [color=green]**Italy: Town Godfather**[/color] 2. @Firekitten - Died Day 1 - [color=green]**Marluxion: Town Tunneler**[/color] 3. @Tangeld - Eliminated Day 1 - [color=cyan]**TheLukundo: Imperial Passive JOAT**[/color] 4. @Marshal - Killed Night 1 - **[color = green]Icibalus, Town "Cop"[/color]** 5. @Nightingale - Killed Night 1 - **[color = green]Frostwolf103, Town Illuminati Cult Leader[/color]** 6. @Wazza - Killed Night 1 - **[color = green]Centuries, Town Shitposter[/color]** 7. @sulit - Died Day 2 - **[color = green]Appelsiini, Town ITA Nerfer[/color]** 8. @astand -> @lol - ITA'd Day 2 - **[color = red]Joker, Mafia Suspicious Peddler[/color]** 9. @Intensify - ITA'd Day 2 - **No flip** 10. @TheLukundo - ITA'd Day 2 - **[color = red]Jane, Mafia Spectator[/color]** 11. @MaximusPrime - ITA'd Day 2 - [color=green]**Mistyx: Town Support JOAT**[/color] 12. @Icibalus - Boatsed Day 2 - [color=green]**PokemonKidRyan: Town Ringmaster**[/color] 6. @KyoDaz - Boatsed Day 2 - [color=green]**Amelia: Town Reverser**[/color] 14. @Amelia - Boatsed Day 2 - [color=red]**Wazza: Mafia Nanobiologist**[/color] 22. @Joker - Boatsed Day 2 - [color=green]**Marshal: Town Greatest (Wo)man That Ever Lived**[/color] 38. @Hippolytus - Boatsed Day 2 - [color=red]**Nightingale: Mafia Painter**[/color] 44. @Psyx -> @Leafia - Boatsed Day 2 - [color=red]**Luxy: Mafia Jailkeeper**[/color] 12. @min - ITA'd Day 2 - [color=green]**ArcticXI: Town Ransomer**[/color] 19. @Whysper - Eliminated Day 2 - [color=green]**Hippoyeetus: Town Outer doG Cult Leader**[/color] 20. @Silviu200530 - Killed Day 2 - [color=green]**katze: Town Chaos**[/color] [details=Replacements] 1. thepigeonnyc 2. ATNoName 3. EliThePsycho 4. Blitz [/details] [details=Spectators] 1. Alice 2. Prophylaxis 3. Nerbins 4. 5. [/details] ## [color=ffe296]Threadmarks[/color] ### [u]****Day 1****[/u] - [**DAY 1 THREAD**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-night-1-44-47/88118?u=folannualmash) [**Event Announcement: Avatars**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/339?u=communityfm3) / [Voting](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/5130?u=communityfm3) [**Event Announcement: 1610**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/1615?u=communityfm3) [**Event Announcement: Math Is Fun!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/3200?u=chloe) [**Event Announcement: Skribblio**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/3703) [**Substitution: lol replaces astand**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/5265?u=communityfm3) [**Substitution: Esooa replaces Ami**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/5652?u=communityfm3) [**Substitution: Leafia replaces Psyx**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/5821?u=communityfm3) [**Eevee is modkilled**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-1-46-47/88118/5903?u=chloe) - [color=green]**Italy: Town Godfather**[/color] [**Event Announcement: Surprising Details**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-1-46-47/88118/5700?u=chloe) [**Firekitten dies!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-1-46-47/88118/6059?u=folannualmash) - [color=green]**Marluxion: Town Tunneler**[/color] [**EoD1: Tangeld is eliminated!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-night-1-44-47/88118/8490?u=chloe) - [color=cyan]**TheLukundo: Imperial Passive JOAT**[/color] ### [u]****Day 2****[/u] [**SoD2: Marshal, Nightingale, and Wazza died in the night! Two NPCs have appeared!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/5?u=arete) [**Event Announcement: RopeStringFace's Return**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/98?u=arete) [**Event Announcement: Throne of Lies: Medieval Politics**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/1273?u=arete) [**sulit dies!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/1861?u=arete) - **[color = green]Appelsiini, Town ITA Nerfer[/color]** [**lol is shot in ITAs!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/1952?u=arete) - **[color = red]Joker, Mafia Suspicious Peddler[/color]** [**Intensify is shot in ITAs!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/2457?u=folannualmash) - **No flip** [**TheLukundo is shot in ITAs!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-37-47/88190/2913?u=arete) - **[color = red]Jane, Mafia Spectator[/color]** [**A shot rings out! Nobody has died!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-thread-2-day-2/88190/2935?u=folannualmash) [**MaximusPrime is shot in ITAs!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-36-47/88190/3281?u=folannualmash) - [color=green]**Mistyx: Town Support JOAT**[/color] [**Intensify flips!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-thread-2-day-2/88190/4830?u=folannualmash) - [color=green]**an_gorta_pratai: Town Tree**[/color] [**Substitution: EliThePsycho replaces SirDerpsAlot**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-36-47/88190/5386?u=folannualmash) [**Boat Explosion Kills Six: Amelia, Hippo, Leafia, icibalus, KyoDaz, Joker**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-30-47/88190/5759?u=folannualmash) [**Min is shot in ITAs!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-30-47/88190/6107?u=folannualmash) - [color=green]**ArcticXI: Town Ransomer**[/color] [**Only Whysper and Marluxion may be voted. Votes are reset.**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-29-47/88190/6935) [**EoD2: Whysper is eliminated and Silviu dies!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-night-2-27-47/88190/7447?u=folannualmash) ### ****[u]Day 3[/u]**** - [**DAY 3 THREAD**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-thread-3-day-3/88199?u=chloe) [**SoD3: Aelin and EliThePsycho died during the night!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-3-25-47/88199/3?u=chloe) [**Event Announcement: Storytime**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-3-24-47/88199/14?u=chloe) [**Marluxion dies!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-3-24-47/88199/168?u=chloe) - [****DAY 4/5/6 THREAD****](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-final-main-thread-game-over-mafia-imperials-win/88209?u=chloe) [**SoD4: Esooa, PKR, and ArcticXI died during the night!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-18-47/88209/4?u=chloe) [**Vulgard dies!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-17-47/88209/410?u=chloe) - [color=green]**Silviu200530: Town Ape Gorilla**[/color] [**Luxy dies!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-16-47/88209/674?u=folannualmash) - [color=green]**GGhana: Town Clown**[/color] [**WindwardAway is shot in ITAs and TrustworthyLiberal wins!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-12-47/88209/1334?u=chloe) [**Jane is shot in ITAs!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-12-47/88209/1348?u=chloe) - [color=red]**Universal: Mafia Enabler**[/color] [**Centuries is shot in ITAs!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-12-47/88209/1491?u=chloe) - [color=red]**osieorb18: Mafia Sensei**[/color] [**EoD4: Gorta is eliminated!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-12-47/88209/2606?u=folannualmash) - [color=red]**Lemonfairy: Mafia Sheepherder**[/color] ### ****[u]Day 5[/u]**** [**SOD5: Blizer Died during the night**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-5-10-47/88209/2617) - [color=green]**Clonedcheese: Town Chronomancer**[/color] [**EoD5: Emilia Executed**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-day-6-6-47/88209/4161?u=datbird) - Frostwolf is eliminated!**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-main-thread-game-over-mafia-imperials-win/88209/4954?u=chloe) ### [**Voting Thread**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-voting-thread/88117?u=folannualmash) ### [**ITA Thread**](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fam-itaing-thread/88191?u=folannualmash)

item.title: FAM Thread 2 (Day 2)
item.dc:creator: FoLAnnualMash
item.description:
Night 2 Event: Scavenger Hunt

Submit photos of as many of the following items as you can. You will receive points for each list item you complete. You must have taken all the photos.

  • A glass of water (you must then drink the water)
  • A drawing of a joycreature
  • Something Danganronpa related
  • Something cat-related
  • Something you read
  • Another social deduction game
  • Something related to lying or deception
  • Something related to cops, doctors, or vigilantes
  • Something related to wolves, scum, or Mafia
  • A town, village, or city
  • Something related to a Forum of Lies class

Your photos are due by the Night 1 action deadline. You may not discuss this event until it has concluded.

Some photos may be highlighted in the event results, at host discretion. If you are uncomfortable with this, you may inform the hosts and your photos will not be highlighted.

Read full topic

item.title: FAM Thread 2 (Day 2)
item.dc:creator: FoLAnnualMash
item.description:
Class Design Event: Results

The following class was voted as the winner:

De pwwetendew :fiwe: :shhiewd:

neutwaw shpweciaw

naw awwewience (pwashshive) - death immunitnye, dawesh nawt pwewshisht upwawn cwashsh chanwe

shiwence (danye) - awccupwnye de kinw faww de danye :cwawwn: - 1 ushe
bawwawt mixinw (danye) - shiwentwnye shwapwsh de kinwsh vawte taw de next hiwhesht wawawn, i wueshsh :cwawwn: - 3 ushesh

bwawawd tesht (niwht) - dishcawvew da pwwanyeewsh cwashsh tnyepwe pwaiwinw and whethew aww nawt thenye have wawnyeaw bwawawd. - inf ushesh
kinshwanyeew (niwht) - attack da pwwanyeew with wawnyeaw bwawawd, aww de kinw. Yawu musht have dishcawvewed thenye have wawnyeaw bwawawd with bwawawd tesht (unweshsh thenye’we kinw) :cwawwn: - 2 ushesh

becawme de kinw

De pwwetendew kinw :fiwe: :shhiewd:

neutwaw shpweciaw

pwashsh de tawwch (pwashshive) - if nyeawu die, da vawte taw detewmine de next kinw wiww be hewd at shtawt awf de next danye.

wwand twiaw (danye) - inshtantwnye pwut da pwwanyeew awn twiaw faww tweashawn washtinw upw taw 24 hawuwsh pwawshshibwnye extendinw danye. Thenye manye pwwawvide da defenshe within 12 hawuwsh, and then de pwwanyeewsh awive manye eithew vawte taw execute aww pwawdawn. If da majawwitnye awf pwwanyeewsh vawte taw execute, de danye wiww end and de pwwanyeew awn twiaw wiww be wnyenched. Awthewwishe, de danye wiww cawntinue ash nawwmaw. - 1 ushe
awwnye? (danye) - chawawshe awne pwwanyeew. Duwinw thish niwht, nyeawu wiww have da pwwivate chat with them. - infinite ushesh

wuawdsh? (niwht) - yawu wiww be death immune tawniwht. - 1 ushe
bwawawd wawwk - dishcawvew da pwwanyeewsh cwashsh tnyepwe pwaiwinw and whethew aww nawt thenye have wawnyeaw bwawawd. If thenye daw, autawmaticawwnye shend da wuawd taw attack them. - 2 ushesh

Survive lol

Prizes have been sent.

Read full topic

item.title: FAM Thread 2 (Day 2)
item.dc:creator: FoLAnnualMash
item.description:
EoD2 Flavor

As a reminder, flavor is NAI.

June 21, 2021

Arete
ok so
let me get this straight
the System had some sort of automated event
where it said ‘if you do x, you will probably die’
and six people
did x

Geyde
yes
also a literal trashman showed up and killed Silviu

Arete
what the fuck

Chloe
Why are you so upset about it? Three of them were hackers, trying to bring down the forum and stop any of us from playing forum mafia.

osieorb18
Chloe, is everything alright? You never used to be so confused about the idea of people objecting to murder.

Chloe
…

DatBird
Hey now. If you need to talk were here for you.

Chloe
…
Leave me alone.

System Message: User "Chloe" has muted and deafened herself.

DatBird
Ok so. Whats happening.

Whysper
Marl, I challenge you to a duel!

DatBird
I guess thats whats happening.

Marluxion
Coward! It will be your life that ends today!

Mistyx
idk, seems kind of sus

nutella
sus? like amogus???

Universal
Please stop.

Whysper
Can I just have a moment to vent my frustration here?

Mistyx
VENT??? like an IMPOSTER???

an_gorta_pratai
Emergency meeting! System, eject Whysper!

System Message: Disconnecting Whysper...
System Message: Whysper has been disconnected. Terminating subject.
System Message: Whysper was: Memesky, Town Outer doG Cult Leader.

Arete
Okay, I’m going to be honest, I don’t really know what happened there.

DatBird
do u think chleb is okay?

Geyde
MAKE IT STOP

Arete
…I’m going to assume that’s related to the Among Us discussion.
but to answer your question, I’m not sure
it’s not like she’s ever trapped me in a life or death simulation before, you know?

osieorb18
Maybe if we can figure out what happened to Chloe, we can figure out how to break out of the simulation.

Read full topic

item.title: FAM Thread 2 (Day 2)
item.dc:creator: FoLAnnualMash
item.description:
Whysper has been eliminated! She was…

Memesky
‘I cant see im deaf’
Town Outer doG Cult Leader

Ascension to Hippoyeetus (Passive): If half of all living players are members of your Cult, you will ascend.

Finger of Death (Day, Enabled, Burnout): Once per game, as a Day action, you may target another player to make it so that only you or that player can be voted during that Day. All votes are reset. When you use this ability, it ceases to exist. This ability may become disabled at some point during the game.

Yes (Night): Each Night, as a Night action, you may target another player to recruit them into the Cult of Hippoyeetus. On Night 1, you may target an additional player. On even Nights, you may use this ability in addition to any other abilities you may use.

Mark of the Meme (Night): Each Night, as a Night action, you may target another member of the Cult of Hippoyeetus to determine their role, prevent all Night actions they would take during that Night, and protect them from kills during that Night.

Eliminate the Mafia and all other possible threats to the Town.

Along with this, Trashman leaves the game, taking Silviu with them!

Silviu has died! They were…

katze
‘but that means im funny and thats false’
Town Chaos

You get a Cat! And you get a Cat! (Day, 2-Target): Each Day, as a Day action, you may post in the thread “[player1] and [player2], EMBRACE THE INSANITY!” and ping the hosts to target two other players. Each of those players gets a cat. Meow. Each Night, for each cat, there is a 50% chance that cat will walk away from that player and either walk to another player or leave the game entirely.

Catthulhu (Passive): If a player with a cat would target you with an action, that action targets another random player instead.

Eliminate the Mafia and all other possible threats to the Town.

Night starts now, and will end: 2021-06-21T17:00:00Z

Actions submitted in the final two hours of the night will not be processed.

Read full topic

END OF DAY 2

Whysper Mistyx, Marluxion, nutella, Universal, WindwardAway, katze, orangeandblack5, Blizer, Aelin, GGhana, an_gorta_pratai 11/15
Marluxion Whysper, Esooa, TrustworthyLiberal, EliThePsycho, Solic 5/15
Not voting Centuries, Silviu200530, Emilia, clonedcheese, Luxy, Jane, Frostwolf, Italy, Appelsiini, Vulgard, PokemonKidRyan, Lemonfairy, ArcticXI 13

All players have 5 minutes to PM us with corrections.
